message: Let's start fair. I'll take a bit more since I'm the one proposing, but I think this is a reasonable split.
I understand you wanting a larger share for proposing, but that split isn't fair to me. Let's be reasonable, I'll take the larger share this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get a better deal than your last offer.  Let's split it 55/45 this time.
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a serious hit from inflation and you're refusing to budge. Take it or leave it - this is my final offer.
